name: URL preservation
source: Visit our website at https://example.com/products for more information.
expected: قم بزيارة موقعنا على https://example.com/products لمزيد من المعلومات.

name: Email preservation
source: Contact us at support@company.com for assistance.
expected: تواصل معنا على support@company.com للحصول على المساعدة.

name: Placeholder preservation
source: Hello {{user_name}}, your order {{order_id}} has been shipped.

name: Mixed tokens
source: Dear {{customer_name}}, please visit https://portal.example.com or email help@example.com for your 50% discount.
expected: عزيزي {{customer_name}}، يرجى زيارة https://portal.example.com أو إرسال بريد إلكتروني إلى help@example.com للحصول على خصم 50%.
